sen.j: 中村 錦之助（なかむら きんのすけ）は、歌舞伎役者の名跡。
sen.e: Kinnosuke NAKAMURA is the professional name of kabuki actors.
Kinnosuke NAKAMURA is the professional name of kabuki actors.
Kinnosuke NAKAMURA is the professional name of kabuki actors.

sen.j: 屋号は始め播磨屋 (歌舞伎)、のち萬屋。
sen.e: His stage family name was Harimaya (kabuki) first and later Yorozuya.
The family stage name was originally Harimaya before becoming Yorozuya.
The family stage name was originally Harimaya before becoming Yorozuya.

sen.j: この名跡は、初代が映画界へ転じて以来35年間も絶えていたが、平成19年（2007年）4月に復活した。
sen.e: This professional name had been extinct for 35 years since the first Kinnosuke turned himself into the film world, but it came back to life in April, 2007.
This professional name had been for 35 years since the first Kinnosuke entered the film industry, but was revived April, 2007.
This professional name had been extinct for 35 years since the first Kinnosuke entered the film industry, but was revived April, 2007.
sen.cmt: ＮＣによって「絶えていた」が削除されていたので、再度補いました。

sen.e: Kinnosuke YOROZUYA (1932 - 1997)
Kinnosuke YOROZUYA (1932 - 1997)
Kinnosuke YOROZUYA (1932 - 1997)

sen.j: - 歌舞伎から映画へ転身、時代劇の大スターとして活躍した。
sen.e: He turned himself into the film world from kabuki and flourished as the big-time star in period drama.
Left kabuki for the film industry and became a major star of period dramas.
Left kabuki for the film industry and became a major star of period dramas.
He later became Yorozuya Kinnosuke.
He later became Yorozuya Kinnosuke.
He later became Kinnosuke YOROZUYA.
Kinnosuke NAKAMURA (The second)(1959 - present)
Kinnosuke NAKAMURA (The second) (1959 - present)
Kinnosuke NAKAMURA (The second) (1959 - present)
He was the nephew of the fist.
The nephew of the fist Kinnosuke NAKAMURA.
The nephew of the fist Kinnosuke NAKAMURA.
He was the forth son of Tokizo NAKAMURA (the forth).
He was the forth son of Tokizo NAKAMURA (the forth).
He was the forth son of Tokizo NAKAMURA (the forth).
Same as Shinjiro NAKAMURA.
His real name is Shinjiro NAKAMURA.
His real name is Shinjiro NAKAMURA.
